quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: Stay away from those people who try to disparage your ambitions. Small minds will always do that, but great minds will give you a feeling that you can become great too.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: When you give joy to other people, you get more joy in return. You should give a good thought to the happiness that you can give out.

quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.quote: When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.

quotes.author: Walter Anderson
quotes.quote: It is only when we take chances that our lives improve. The initial and the most difficult risk we need to take is to become honest.

quotes.author: Diane McLaren
quotes.quote: Nature has given us all the pieces required to achieve exceptional wellness and health, but has left it to us to put these pieces together.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Herman Melville
quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

quotes.author: Colin R. Davis
quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge
quotes.quote: Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence... The slogan ‘Press On’ has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race.

quotes.author: Mister Rogers
quotes.quote: There are three ways to ultimate success: The first way is to be kind. The second way is to be kind. The third way is to be kind.

quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.

quotes.author: Estée Lauder
quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.

quotes.author: W. P. Kinsella
quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

quotes.author: Will Rogers
quotes.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.

quotes.author: Vernon Sanders Law
quotes.quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.

quotes.author: Dorothy West
quotes.quote: To know how much there is to know is the beginning of learning to live.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Goal setting is the secret to a compelling future.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
quotes.quote: I’m a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.

quotes.author: Paulo Coelho
quotes.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.

quotes.author: Cindy Gallop
quotes.quote: Women challenge the status quo because we are never it.

quotes.author: Arlan Hamilton
quotes.quote: We don’t just sit around and wait for other people. We just make, and we do.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: The strongest actions for a woman is to love herself, be herself and shine amongst those who never believed she could.

quotes.author: Yulia Tymoshenko
quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful woman, look out for three men who are going out of their way to try to block her.

quotes.author: Lady Gaga
quotes.quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some choose to follow their dreams. If you’re wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn’t love you anymore.

quotes.author: Roseanne Barr
quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.

quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm
quotes.quote: If they don’t give you a seat at the table, bring a folding chair.

quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai
quotes.quote: I raise up my voice—not so that I can shout, but so that those without a voice can be heard. … We cannot all succeed when half of us are held back.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather become a man of value.

quotes.author: Andrew Jackson
quotes.quote: One man with courage makes a majority.

quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli
quotes.quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.

quotes.author: Confucius Kongzi
quotes.quote: A man who has committed a mistake and doesn’t correct it is committing another mistake.

quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.

quotes.author: David Brinkley
quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.

quotes.author: George Lorimer
quotes.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

quotes.author: Amelia Earhart
quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.

quotes.author: John Graham
quotes.quote: You’ll find that education is just about the only thing lying around loose in this world, and it’s about the only thing a fellow can have as much of as he’s willing to haul away.

quotes.author: Augustine Og Mandino
quotes.quote: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.

quotes.author: Charlie Munger
quotes.quote: It is remarkable how much long-term advantage people like us have gotten by trying to be consistently not stupid, instead of trying to be very intelligent.

quotes.author: Tina Fey
quotes.quote: You can’t be that kid standing at the top of the waterslide, overthinking it. You have to go down the chute.

quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy
quotes.quote: When I believe in something, I’m like a dog with a bone.

quotes.author: Anaïs Nin
quotes.quote: And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.

quotes.author: David Hurley
quotes.quote: The standard you walk past is the standard you accept.

quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quotes.quote: I’ve searched all the parks in all the cities and found no statues of committees.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: Get a good idea and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it’s done right.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Joe Girard
quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.

quotes.author: Dave Carolan
quotes.quote: Be a positive energy trampoline—absorb what you need and rebound more back.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing—that’s why we recommend it daily.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: Work until your bank account looks like a phone number.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.

quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh
quotes.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.

quotes.author: Tom Lehrer
quotes.quote: Life is like a sewer … what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.

quotes.author: Lily Tomlin
quotes.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Individual commitment to a group effort—that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie
quotes.quote: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.

quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni
quotes.quote: Remember, teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.

quotes.author: Jean-Francois Cope
quotes.quote: I invite everyone to choose forgiveness rather than division, teamwork over personal ambition.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quote: Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.

quotes.author: Chris Grosser
quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.

quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quotes.quote: Love your family, work super hard, live your passion.

quotes.author: George Eliot
quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: Don’t let someone else’s opinion of you become your reality.

quotes.author: Mark Cuban
quotes.quote: If you’re not positive energy, you’re negative energy.

quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey
quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.

quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.quote: Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.author: William James
quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.

quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka
quotes.quote: One of the differences between some successful and unsuccessful people is that one group is full of doers, while the other is full of wishers.

quotes.author: Lucille Ball
quotes.quote: I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done.

quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quotes.quote: You cannot plow a field by turning it over in your mind. To begin, begin.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love.

quotes.author: David Dweck
quotes.quote: Mondays offer new beginnings 52 times a year!

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it’s always your choice.

quotes.author: Germany Kent
quotes.quote: Your Monday morning thoughts set the tone for your whole week. See yourself getting stronger, and living a fulfilling, happier, and healthier life.

quotes.author: Kate Summers
quotes.quote: Friday sees more smiles than any other day of the workweek!

quotes.author: S. O’ Sade
quotes.quote: Oh! It’s Friday again. Share the love that was missing during the week. In a worthy moment of peace and bliss.

quotes.author: Nanea Hoffman
quotes.quote: Every Friday, I like to high-five myself for getting through another week on little more than caffeine, willpower, and inappropriate humor.

quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer
quotes.quote: Make a Friday a day to celebrate work well done that you can be proud of, knowing that you just didn’t put in time to the next paycheck.

quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer
quotes.quote: When you leave work on Friday, leave work. Don’t let technology follow you throughout your weekend (answering text messages and emails). Take a break. You will be more refreshed to begin the workweek if you have had a break.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Angela Bassett
quotes.quote: Don’t settle for average. Bring your best to the moment. Then, whether it fails or succeeds, at least you know you gave all you had.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Isabel Allende
quotes.quote: Show up, show up, show up, and after a while the muse shows up, too.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: David Ogilvy
quotes.quote: Don’t bunt. Aim out of the ballpark. Aim for the company of immortals.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Barbara Elaine Smith
quotes.quote: I have stood on a mountain of no’s for one yes.

quotes.category: Best motivational quotes to start your day
quotes.author: Tobias Lütke
quotes.quote: If you believe something needs to exist, if it’s something you want to use yourself, don’t let anyone ever stop you from doing it.

quotes.author: Anne Lamott
quotes.quote: Don’t look at your feet to see if you are doing it right. Just dance.

quotes.author: Warren Buffet
quotes.quote: Someone’s sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler
quotes.quote: True freedom is impossible without a mind made free by discipline.

quotes.author: A. A. Milne
quotes.quote: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there someday.

quotes.author: Martha Graham
quotes.quote: There is a vitality, a life force, an energy, a quickening that is translated through you into action, and because there is only one of you in all time, this expression is unique. And if you block it, it will never exist through any other medium and will be lost.

quotes.author: Jason Fried
quotes.quote: Small is not just a stepping stone. Small is a great destination itself.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.

quotes.author: Jessica Ennis
quotes.quote: The only one who can tell you ‘you can’t win’ is you, and you don’t have to listen.

quotes.author: Bo Jackson
quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.

quotes.author: Mia Hamm
quotes.quote: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don’t settle for them.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Life can be much broader once you discover one simple fact: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you. And you can change it, you can influence it. … Once you learn that, you’ll never be the same again.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: I have never let my schooling interfere with my education.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: If you can’t yet do great things, do small things in a great way.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.

quotes.author: Jay-Z
quotes.quote: I will not lose, for even in defeat, there’s a valuable lesson learned, so it evens up for me.

quotes.author: Carl Sagan
quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke
quotes.quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.

quotes.author: Ross Simmonds
quotes.quote: Hustle beats talent when talent doesn’t hustle.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

quotes.author: George Addair
quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is sitting on the other side of fear.

quotes.author: Ayn Rand
quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

quotes.author: Babe Ruth
quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

quotes.author: Drew Houston
quotes.quote: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once.

quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg
quotes.quote: You carry the passport to your own happiness.

quotes.author: Drake
quotes.quote: Never let success get to your head, and never let failure get to your heart.

quotes.author: Robin Sharma
quotes.quote: Ideation without execution is delusion.

quotes.author: Laird Hamilton
quotes.quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.

quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quotes.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh
quotes.quote: For the great doesn’t happen through impulse alone, and is a succession of little things that are brought together.

quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth
quotes.quote: If we take care of the moments, the years will take care of themselves.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: Resilience is when you address uncertainty with flexibility.

quotes.author: Raymond Joseph Teller
quotes.quote: Sometimes magic is just someone spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.

quotes.author: Paul Bryant
quotes.quote: It’s not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: As a single footstep will not make a path on the earth, so a single thought will not make a pathway in the mind. To make a deep physical path, we walk again and again. To make a deep mental path, we must think over and over the kind of thoughts we wish to dominate our lives.

quotes.author: Earl Nightingale
quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: True humility is not thinking less of yourself; it is thinking of yourself less.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you’re born and the day you find out why.

quotes.author: Pema Chodron
quotes.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: We can see through others only when we can see through ourselves.

quotes.author: Octavia Butler
quotes.quote: First, forget inspiration. Habit is more dependable. Habit will sustain you whether you’re inspired or not. Habit will help you finish and polish your stories. Inspiration won’t. Habit is persistence in practice.

quotes.author: Robert Frost
quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.

quotes.author: Jesse Owens
quotes.quote: The battles that count aren’t the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself—the invisible, inevitable battles inside all of us—that’s where it’s at.

quotes.author: Frederick Douglass
quotes.quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.

quotes.author: Bill Walsh
quotes.quote: Someone will declare, ‘I am the leader!’ and expect everyone to get in line and follow him or her to the gates of heaven or hell. My experience is that it doesn’t happen that way. Others follow you based on the quality of your actions rather than the magnitude of your declarations.

quotes.author: Ruth Gordo
quotes.quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.

quotes.author: Paul Graham
quotes.quote: Relentlessly prune bullshit, don’t wait to do things that matter, and savor the time you have. That’s what you do when life is short.

quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
quotes.quote: More is lost by indecision than wrong decision.

quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas
quotes.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.

quotes.author: Dita Von Teese
quotes.quote: You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there’s still going to be somebody who hates peaches.

quotes.author: Cormac McCarthy
quotes.quote: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.

quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: You’ll never get bored when you try something new. There’s really no limit to what you can do.

quotes.author: Don Cheadle
quotes.quote: I think it’s intoxicating when somebody is so unapologetically who they are.

quotes.author: Leymah Gbowee
quotes.quote: You can never leave footprints that last if you are always walking on tiptoe.

quotes.author: Dolly Parton
quotes.quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.

quotes.author: Childish Gambino
quotes.quote: If it makes you nervous, you’re doing it right.

quotes.author: Jane Goodall
quotes.quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

quotes.author: Louise Hay
quotes.quote: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.

quotes.author: Coco Chanel
quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut
quotes.quote: Anything can make me stop and look and wonder, and sometimes learn.

quotes.author: Constance Wu
quotes.quote: People’s passion and desire for authenticity is strong.

quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor
quotes.quote: A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.

quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez
quotes.quote: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.

quotes.author: Billie Jean King
quotes.quote: No one changes the world who isn’t obsessed.

quotes.author: Mia Hamm
quotes.quote: I learned a long time ago that there is something worse than missing the goal, and that’s not pulling the trigger.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
